about_the_game:
It is time for the true vanguard of every nation to awaken and throw off the shackles of ochlocracy! The Red Gene has not been forgotten and every its representative of every nation must become the sole ruling stratum. Some may call this a restoration of the monarchy or aristocracy, but there is no connection, for only the heirs of the revolutionary cadres carry the genetic material that determines their revolutionary spirit!

- Establish the domination of the Red Gene Theory in China!
- Influence the fate of Austria and Hungary and perhaps even restore Austria-Hungary!
- Realise the destiny of the Red Gene of the Yugoslavs!
- Restore the lost paths of Romania!
- Protect the identity of the Prussian people from the German-French expansion!
- Revitalise the legacy of Jan Hus!
- Also get involved in the new mechanics of Swiss secret bank accounts, but beware of freezing them!

"It is impossible to stop the movement of a people awakened after a thousand-year sleep. But if the Tsar had become firmly and boldly at the head of the movement itself, then his power for the good and for the glory of the State would have no measure." Mikhail Bakunin.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, Windows 8, 8.1, Windows 10, etc (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
